data.title: A University System of Georgia Institution
data.meta_description: Columbus State University, ranked among the top regional universities in the south by U.S. News & World Report, offers nationally distinctive programs in the arts, education, business, nursing and more. Columbus State University provides a creative, deeply personal and relevant college experience. Serving the Southeast while attracting students from around the world, Columbus State University thrives on community partnerships to deliver excellence for students who want to achieve personal and professional success in an increasingly global environment.
data.text:
CREATE your foundation

Your education is the foundation of your future, and we are committed to help you build that. As you discover who you want to be through your studies, you'll also learn to think critically, see things in new ways, collaborate across disciplines and discover new solutions.

CREATE your community

We know that the college experience is better with friends, and you'll make new ones from your first day at CSU through our lively student activities and organizations. Explore opportunities to gain leadership skills, volunteer in our community, and share your interests and passions with others.

CREATE your home

You'll feel right at home in our close-knit campus communities and dynamic student facilities. Our residence halls on both Main Campus and RiverPark Campus provide you with a safe living and learning environment that is inclusive to all students.
